channel.title: Runes arent working for me

item.title: Runes arent working for me
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[code]if(spellID == 12871) // ice blitz (lvl 82 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 82 && playerHasItemAmount(555, 3) == true)
{
startAnimation(1978);
hitDiff = misc.random(22);
castOnPlayer.entangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(368, absY, absX);
stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You are frozen!”);
PkingDelay = 15;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 3);
}

else if(playerLevel[6] <= 81)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 82 to cast this spell.”);
}
}[/code]
why isnt this working for me?

Read full topic
